message_text: Hi, I applied for a loan 3 days ago and haven't heard back. When will my loan be approved? I need the funds urgently for a medical emergency.
Can you help me update my phone number on my account? I changed my number last week.
My loan was approved yesterday! When will the funds be disbursed to my account? I'm waiting to make an important payment.
I'm having trouble logging into my account. It says my password is incorrect but I'm sure it's right. Can you help?
What documents do I need to upload for loan verification? The app doesn't make it very clear.
URGENT: My loan application status still shows pending after 5 days. I need this loan to be processed ASAP as I have an urgent business expense.
How do I check my loan application status? Where can I see updates?
My account seems to be frozen. I can't access any features. Please help immediately!
What are the interest rates for personal loans? I'm considering applying.
I uploaded my salary slip 2 days ago but it's still showing as pending verification. When will this be verified?
The disbursement has been delayed by 4 days now. My loan was approved on Monday but I still haven't received the funds. This is critical!
Can I update my bank account details? I opened a new account and want the loan to be disbursed there instead.
What's the maximum loan amount I can apply for based on my profile?
My loan application was rejected. Can you tell me why and what I can do to improve my chances?
I need to speak to someone about my loan approval urgently. I've been waiting for over a week.
How long does the verification process typically take?
Can you provide me with my account statement for the last 3 months?
When will I get my loan? It's been approved for 3 days and still no disbursement. I need this money today!
Is there a mobile app for iOS? I can only find the Android version.
I want to close my account. What's the process?
My application status changed to 'under review' - what does this mean? How long will the review take?
URGENT: Loan disbursement needed immediately. Approved 5 days ago but funds not received. Critical situation!
Can I apply for a second loan while my first one is still active?
How do I change my email address associated with my account?
What are your customer service hours? I need to call but don't know when you're available.
My loan was approved! How soon will the money be disbursed to my account?
I'm unable to upload documents. The app keeps crashing when I try. Please fix this issue.
Can you explain the repayment schedule for a 12-month loan?
Account blocked! Can't login! This is an emergency - I need access right now!
How can I improve my credit score with your platform?
